app_descript:
App Name: BitBible

Brief: BitBible is a mobile companion for those who aspire to integrate the Holy Scriptures into their daily life effortlessly. It encourages not only routine church attendance but emphasizes the significance of personal Bible study and prayer. Enhanced by distinct features, BitBible serves as a lock-screen guide to scripture, enriching your spiritual journey with every phone glance.

## App Name: BitBible

### Brief:
BitBible is a mobile companion for those who aspire to integrate the Holy Scriptures into their daily life effortlessly. It encourages not only routine church attendance but emphasizes the significance of personal Bible study and prayer. Enhanced by distinct features, BitBible serves as a lock-screen guide to scripture, enriching your spiritual journey with every phone glance.
